name: svelte5-runes-static
description: Svelte 5 runes + SvelteKit adapter-static (SSG/SSR) patterns for hydration-safe state, store bridges, and reactivity that survives prerendering
author: Claude MPM Team
when_to_use: Managing global state in SSG/SSR Svelte apps
Migrating from Svelte 4 to Svelte 5 with static adapter
key_learnings: Runes don't work in module scope with adapter-static

Cannot use $ auto-subscription inside $derived in runes mode
Hybrid approach: stores for global, runes for component-local
